EVALUATION D'UN PROJET DE
            DEVELOPPEMENT RURAL DANS LES REGIONS COTONNIERES - TOGO

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Rural Development in Cotton
            Areas Project will strengthen SOTOCO by providing: buildings
            and equipment for SOTOCO headquarter and field services
            (including establishment of a seed multiplication and field
            trials system; additional management and field staff,
            training and related operating expenses; providing
            ox-cultivation training and credit to farmers for
            acquisition of ox-drawn equipment; expanding the Project
            Monitoring and Evaluation Unit within the Ministry of Rural
            Development; building and improving about 700 km of feeder
            roads; providing incremental on-farm inputs to expand
            improved cotton planting by 20,000 ha; improved maize by
            13,700 ha; improved sorghum by 7,500 ha; and improved
            groundnuts by 2,700 ha.
